title3: Stick Em With the Pointy End

title: Maeve Leaflock
overview: The stealthy by choice, firecracker by nature, Rogue of the Decent Humanoids
rightInfo1: Maeve checking if the coast is clear before continuing her stealth mission
SectionOneP1: Maeve wasn't always level 13, but she was always a badd ass bitcchh.
SectionTwoP1: Maeve now resides in the reconstructed Dunshire with her family. She enjoys sparring with Trove when Trove is in town, and playing with her brother Jax.

title: Dagger of Many Daggers
overview: This thing is one dagger, but then sometimes many daggers
rightInfo1: The dagger is a well made physical +1 weapon. The dagger feels well balanced for throwing, and if during an attack the power word is spoken many ethereal daggers fly with it.
rightInfo3: +1 Magical Dagger - Two charges per day
rightInfo5: If power word is spoken, roll 2d4, and gain that many extra attacks.
title1: Why carry many blade when one do trick?
SectionOneP1:
The first time this dagger is used is always an interesting experience for the user. They swear they only threw one, but those five daggers they threw were not imaginary. When confronted on how they managed to throw five daggers at the same time, they'll scratch their head and say "I only threw one...". 
  
When it's pointed out that there are five puncture marks, but there was only one dagger in the dummy, it left everyone scratching their heads.
